text: François Nicolas Léonard Buzot (1 March 1760 in Évreux – 24 June 1794 in Saint-Émilion) was a French politician and leader of the French Revolution. He suicide together with fellow-Girondin Jérôme Pétion de Villeneuve. Category:1760 births Category:1794 deaths Category:Politicians from Normandy Category:People from Évreux Category:Suicides in France
title: François Buzot
